descriptionHtml:
Strong Artifacts

*Dawnbreaker*
-damage 12--> 14
-Fire dmg removed
-Sun Damage added, 70 AOE: 15 ft ( starts stronger than Rune Axe but with use Rune axe effect can get to 100 in vanilla )
-Undead dmg explosion on kill 25-->100
-Turn Undead 30-->60
-Maximum charges
-Unlimited power
-Stagger 0.75-->1.0

*Mace of Molag Bal*
-dmg 16-->18
-Stagger 1.0-->1.2
-Maximum charges
-unlimited power
-Absorb Health 45 pts 2 seconds added

*Mehrune's Razor*
-now ignores normal weapon defense
-crit % from 1.0 to 1.5 ( game caps how often you can crit so no point in higher )
-Maximum charges
-unlimited power
-1% chance to instant kill increased to 5%

*Staff of Magnus*
-Maximum charges
-unlimited power
-Magicka drain effect 20 --> 80
-Health damage after target out of magicka 20-->50

Dragonbane (edited all versions to this )
-maximum charges
-damage (10-14)-->14
-dragon damage 40-->60
-Shock damage 10-->15

Still need to add:

Volundrung
Wuuthrad
author: kapxis
